data.name: AutosaveDialogCaption
data.comment: Title of the crash recovery dialog.

data.name: AutosaveDialogText
data.value: Last session has not exited normally. Restore autosaved game?
data.comment: Text of the crash recovery dialog.

data.name: AutosaveNotFound
data.value: Can't restore: no autosave file was found.
data.comment: Text of the crash recovery dialog.

data.name: AvailableCommands
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: BoardIsHidden
data.comment: Displayed in the middle of the screen.

data.name: CantStartServer
data.comment: Error when trying to host. {0} is a placeholder for the error message.

data.name: CantStartServerInvalidDeviceAddress
data.value: Can't start server: port {0} is already in use. Try again with a different port.
data.comment: Error when trying to host. {0} is a placeholder for a port number.

data.name: CommandError
data.comment: Generic error message. {0} and {1} are placeholders for additional text.

data.name: ConnectionData
data.comment: Text copied to clipboard when hosting. {0} is a placeholder for an IP address. {1} is a placeholder for a port number.

data.name: ConnectionDataCopiedToClipboard
data.value: IP address and port have been copied to the clipboard.
data.comment: Notification when hosting.

data.name: ConnectionFailed
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectionFailureHostRejectedConnection
data.value: The connection request was rejected by host.
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectionFailureNoConnection
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectionFailureNotHost
data.value: You attempted to connect to a nonhost computer.
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectionFailureOther
data.value: The request to connect to the host failed.
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectionFailureSessionFull
data.value: The maximum number of players for the session has been reached.
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectionFailureTimeOut
data.value: The connection request has timed out.
data.comment: Error when trying to join a session.

data.name: ConnectivityCancelLimited
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCancelNoEgress
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCancelNoIngress
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCancelNoInternet
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCancelPortInUse
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCaptionLimited
data.comment: Caption of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCaptionNoEgress
data.comment: Caption of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCaptionNoIngress
data.comment: Caption of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCaptionNoInternet
data.comment: Caption of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityCaptionPortInUse
data.comment: Caption of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityOkLimited
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityOkNoEgress
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityOkNoIngress
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityOkNoInternet
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityOkPortInUse
data.comment: Button text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityTextLimited
data.value: ZunTzu's central server is momentarily out of service. Players may be unable to join.
data.comment: Text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityTextNoEgress
data.value: Change your firewall settings to let ZunTzu send data to the Internet.
data.comment: Text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityTextNoIngress
data.value: Change your firewall settings to let ZunTzu receive connection requests from the Internet.
data.comment: Text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityTextNoInternet
data.value: Only players on your local network will be able to join.
data.comment: Text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: ConnectivityTextPortInUse
data.value: That Internet port is reserved by another program. Try again with a different port number.
data.comment: Text of a connectivity status alert when hosting

data.name: DiceModelsComplex
data.comment: Text used in the Display Settings dialog.

data.name: DiceModelsSimple
data.comment: Text used in the Display Settings dialog.

data.name: DisconnectFirst
data.value: Command ignored. You need to disconnect first.
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: FileOpenFilter
data.comment: Text used in the File Open dialog.

data.name: FileSaveAsFilter
data.comment: Text used in the File Save as dialog.

data.name: GameBoxAlreadyOpened
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: GameBoxError02
data.value: game-box.xml doesn't begin with a "<?xml " line followed by "<game-box ".

data.name: GameBoxError05
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "{1}" is invalid without attribute "{2}".

data.name: GameBoxError06
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "{1}" is irrelevant for a card section.

data.name: GameBoxError07
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "{1}" is irrelevant for a counter or terrain section.

data.name: GameBoxError08
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "{1}" refers to a file that can't be found in the game box archive.

data.name: GameBoxError10
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "{1}" should end with ".jpg" or ".png".

data.name: GameBoxError11
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "{1}" is irrelevant for a terrain section.

data.name: GameBoxError19
data.value: , line {0}: found data after final end-tag "</{1}>".

data.name: GameBoxError20
data.value: , line {0}: invalid attribute "{1}" because no back image.

data.name: GameBoxError21
data.value: , line {0}: invalid value "{1}" for attribute "{2}" because no back image.

data.name: GameBoxError24
data.value: , line {0}: mandatory attribute "{1}" present but empty.

data.name: GameBoxError25
data.value: , line {0}: section type is "{1}" so attribute "{2}" is invalid.

data.name: GameBoxError26
data.value: , line {0}: section type is "{1}" so attribute "{2}" is required.

data.name: GameBoxError27
data.value: , line {0}: invalid section type for this sheet.

data.name: GameBoxError31
data.value: : scenario file doesn't begin with a "<?xml " line followed by "<game ".

data.name: GameBoxError36
data.value: , line {0}: attribute "board" refers to an undefined board "{1}".

data.name: GameBoxError37
data.value: , line {0}: board "{1}" wrongly assumed to be double-sided.

data.name: GameBoxError42
data.value: , line {0}: mask size doesn't match image size.

data.name: GameBoxFileMoved
data.value: Game box file "{0}" has been deleted or moved.
data.comment: Error when opening a game box or game or joining a session. {0} is a placeholder for the name of the game box.

data.name: GameBoxNotFound
data.value: Game box "{0}" was not found in the library.
data.comment: Error when opening a game or joining a session. {0} is a placeholder for the name of the game box.

data.name: GameBoxOpened
data.comment: Notification when the hosting player has opened a different game box. {0} is a placeholder for the name of the game box.

data.name: GameSaved
data.comment: Notification after File Save.

data.name: HostHasLeft
data.comment: Notification.

data.name: NoGameToSave
data.comment: Error when saving the game when no game box is opened (ZunTzu logo welcome screen).

data.name: NoInternetConnection
data.value: This session can't be joined from the Internet. Check your Internet connection and your firewall settings.
data.comment: Warning when hosting.

data.name: NoParameterSupported
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: NotConnected
data.value: Command ignored. You are not connected.
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: NotHosting
data.value: Command ignored. You must be hosting to run this command.
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: PlayerHasJoined
data.comment: Notification. {0} is a placeholder for the Player's firstname and lastname.

data.name: PlayerHasLeft
data.comment: Notification. {0} is a placeholder for the Player's firstname and lastname.

data.name: PlayerRenamed
data.comment: Notification when a player changes his name. {0} is a placeholder for the Player's previous firstname and lastname. {1} is a placeholder for the new firstname and lastname.

data.name: QuitNoSavingRequiredButton
data.comment: Text for the OK button in the Quit confirmation dialog.

data.name: QuitNoSavingRequiredPrompt
data.comment: Text for the Quit confirmation dialog.

data.name: SameAsDesktop
data.comment: Text for the fullscreen definition in the Display Settings dialog.

data.name: ServerListeningNatTraversalDisabled
data.value: Players can join from the Internet using address {0} and port {1}.
data.comment: Notification when hosting. {0} is a placeholder for an IP address. {1} is a placeholder for a port number.

data.name: ServerListeningNatTraversalEnabled
data.value: Players can join from the Internet using session code {0}.
data.comment: Notification when hosting. {0} is a placeholder for an IP address. {1} is a placeholder for a port number.

data.name: ToolTipShowHand

data.name: ToolTipUndo

data.name: UnableToConnectGameBoxNotFound
data.value: Unable to connect to game. Game box "{0}" was not found in the library.
data.comment: Error when joining a session. {0} is a placeholder for the name of the game box.

data.name: UnableToOpenGame
data.value: Unable to open game. Game box "{0}" was not found in the library.
data.comment: Error when opening a game. {0} is a placeholder for the name of the game box.

data.name: UseSaveasCommand
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: UseSaveasquitCommand
data.comment: Used by the command line (not documented).

data.name: Version
data.comment: Displayed below the rolling dice in the welcome screen.

data.name: VistaWarningNoVoice
data.value: This version of ZunTzu doesn't support voice communication when running Windows Vista.
data.comment: [1.2] Displayed when hosting or connecting running Vista

data.name: VoiceConnectionFailed
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureCompressionNotSupported
data.value: The specified compression type is not supported on the local computer.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureIncompatibleVersion
data.value: The client connected to a voice session that is incompatible with the host.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureNoVoiceSession
data.value: The session specified is not a voice session.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureOther
data.value: The request to connect to the host failed.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureRunSetup
data.value: The specified audio configuration has not been tested.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureSoundInitFailure
data.value: A failure was encountered initializing the sound card.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: VoiceFailureTimeOut
data.value: The operation could not be performed in the specified time.
data.comment: Error during the establishment of the voice communication when joining a session.

data.name: Welcome
data.value: Welcome to ZunTzu! Press Esc to begin.
data.comment: Displayed after ZunTzu has launched.

data.name: YouAreConnected
data.value: You're connected to host. Waiting for game data...
data.comment: Notification when joining a session.

data.name: YouAreDisconnected
data.comment: Notification when disconnected from session.

data.name: YouAreHosting
data.comment: Notification when hosting.

data.name: YouHaveBeenDisconnectedGameBoxNotFound
data.value: You've been disconnected. Game box "{0}" was not found in the library.
data.comment: Error after the hosting player has loaded a different game box. {0} is a placeholder for the name of the game box.
